query:
ALTER TABLE quotations 
ADD COLUMN finalAmount DECIMAL(15,2) AFTER totalAmount,
ADD COLUMN includesTax BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER finalAmount,
ADD COLUMN taxRate DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 15.00 AFTER includesTax,
ADD COLUMN taxAmount DECIMAL(15,2) AFTER taxRate,
ADD COLUMN discountType ENUM('percentage', 'fixed') AFTER taxAmount,
ADD COLUMN discountValue DECIMAL(15,2) AFTER discountType,
ADD COLUMN discountAmount DECIMAL(15,2) AFTER discountValue;
